import React from 'react' function FormComponent(props){ return (
You Varior?
You Vegan?
You Lucky?

Your name: {this.state.firstName}

Your Last Name: {this.state.lastName}

Your Age: {this.state.age}

Your Gender: {this.state.gender}

Varior: {this.state.directoryRegistretion.isVarior ? "True" : "False"}

Vegan: {this.state.directoryRegistretion.isVegan ? "True" : "False"}

Luky: {this.state.directoryRegistretion.isLuky ? "True" : "False"}

) } export default FormComponent
